tool_description: Merges duplicate bibliographic records by combining the best elements from each record and maintaining data integrity.

primary_record_id.description: ID of the record to serve as primary/master record

duplicate_record_ids.description: IDs of duplicate records to merge into primary

preserve_holdings.description: Whether to preserve all holdings records

cataloger_review.description: Whether to flag for cataloger review before finalizing

error_messages: Primary record not found: The specified primary record does not exist
Duplicate record not found: One or more duplicate records do not exist
Invalid merge strategy: Use one of [keep_primary, best_data, manual_review]
Too many duplicates: Maximum 10 duplicate records can be merged at once
Merge conflict detected: Records have conflicting data that requires manual review
usage: Specify a primary record and one or more duplicate records to merge. Choose merge strategy and whether to preserve holdings or require cataloger review.

merged_record_id.description: ID of the final merged record

deleted_record_ids.description: IDs of records deleted after merge

holdings_transferred.description: Number of holdings records transferred to merged record
